items.sentence: I\'d like to drive across the USA in a convertible.
I\'d like to talk to the doctor alone for a moment.
I\'d like you to translate this report into French.
I\'ll never forget your kindness as long as I live.
I\'m almost certain it was Tom who stole my wallet.
I didn\'t start wearing glasses until I was thirty.
I don\'t think that Tom knows anyone at our school.
Would you tell Tom why you don\'t enjoy doing that?
Wouldn\'t it be better if you did that by yourself?
Yesterday, Tom told me he didn\'t know how to swim.
You aren\'t allowed to bring food into the library.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what you asked him not to do.
I hope you\'ve learned something from your mistake.
I told you guys to go home. Why are you still here?
I took time off from work and went to the hospital.
Tom and Mary haven\'t unpacked their suitcases yet.
Tom wouldn\'t have been able to do that without me.
There\'s no need to panic. There\'s plenty of time.
Tom is too drunk to drive. Could you take him home?
Tom is very proud of both his son and his daughter.
